title: Cloud Pub/Sub API Publish Messages to Topic Operation Response Schema
description: Schema representing the output of the Publish Messages to Topic operation in Cloud Pub/Sub API

messageIds.description: The server-assigned ID of each published message, in the same order as the messages in the request. IDs are guaranteed to be unique within the topic.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code of the API response.

headers.description: HTTP headers of the API response.
